Name: Z-Merits
Desc: Used for purchasing valuable items in Outpost Logistics
Desc2: Among Investigators, there's a lot of insider lingo, and "you can earn Z-Merits" is the most unique one. It could be a joke on rookies, a threat to juniors, admiration for seniors, or a curse on troublemakers... Because there's only one way to earn Z-Merits â€” participating in the investigation of Hollow Zero...
